newsitem.title: CHINA: PRESS DIGEST - Shanghai newspapers - May 23.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Shanghai newspapers - May 23.

text.p: Following is a summary of major political and business stories in local newspapers, prepared by Reuters in Shanghai. Reuters has not checked the stories and does not guarantee their accuracy.
- SHANGHAI SECURITIES NEWS - The People's Bank of China, the central bank, issues guidelines for financial institutions to strengthen internal supervision, especially on risk control.

- All space available for public sale in the new Shanghai stock exchange building located in Pudong has been sold out due to overseas and domestic institutions taking an optimistic view over Pudong's future.
- The Association of Shanghai Listed Firms' Secretaries makes proposals on improving the quality of shareholders meetings.
- BUSINESS NEWS - An official blueprint on China's foreign trade predicts continued growth of China's exports for the rest of this year and a fall in imports.
